about_the_game:
Newark Liberty International Airport
IATA: EWR, ICAO: KEWR, FAA LID: EWR

It is one of the major airports of the New York metropolitan area.

Newark Airport is located 3 miles (4.8 km) south of Downtown Newark, and 9 miles (14 km) west-southwest of the borough of Manhattan. It is one of three major airports serving the New York metropolitan area; the others are KJFK and KLGA.

In 2017, EWR was the sixth busiest airport in the United States by international passenger traffic and fifteenth busiest airport in the country.

Runways
The airport covers 2,027 acres (820 ha) and has three runways:
* 4L/22R
* 4R/22L
* 11/29

Terminals:
Across the airport's three terminals, there are 121 gates: Terminal A has 29 gates, Terminal B has 24 gates, and Terminal C has 68 gates.

Each terminal has three concourses: Terminal A, for instance, is divided into concourses A1, A2 and A3. Gate numbering starts in Terminal A with Gate 10 and ends in Terminal C with Gate 139.

name: Tower!3D - KEWR Airport

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64 bit Windows 7 Pro / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Tower!3D
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB dedicated video card
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Tower!3D
